1. Admission Consultation.korean: 네 맞아요. 현재 내신 등급이 어떻게 되세요?
1. Admission Consultation.tts: 네 맞아요. 현재 내신 등급이 어떻게 되세요?
1. Admission Consultation.roman: ne ma-ja-yo. hyeon-jae nae-sin deung-geu-bi eo-tteo-ke doe-se-yo?
1. Admission Consultation.english: Yes, that's right. What is your current grade?

1. Admission Consultation.speaker: Visitor
1. Admission Consultation.english: It's a level 2. Will I pass?

1. Admission Consultation.speaker: Staff
1. Admission Consultation.korean: 그 정도면 충분히 합격 가능성이 있어요. 면접도 준비하셔야 해요.
1. Admission Consultation.tts: 그 정도면 충분히 합격 가능성이 있어요. 면접도 준비하셔야 해요.
1. Admission Consultation.roman: geu jeong-do-myeon chung-bun-hi hap-kkyeok ga-neung-seong-i i-sseo-yo. myeon-jeop-tto jun-bi-ha-syeo-ya hae-yo.
1. Admission Consultation.english: If you can do that, you have a good chance of passing. You should also prepare for the interview.

1. Admission Consultation.speaker: Staff
1. Admission Consultation.korean: 학과마다 방식이 달라요. 경영학과는 인성면접 위주로 진행돼요.
1. Admission Consultation.tts: 학과마다 방식이 달라요. 경영학과는 인성면접 위주로 진행돼요.
1. Admission Consultation.roman: hak-kkwa-ma-da bang-si-gi dal-la-yo. gyeong-yeong-hak-kkwa-neun in-seong-myeon-jeop wi-ju-ro jin-haeng-dwae-yo.
1. Admission Consultation.english: The process varies by department. The business administration department focuses on personality interviews.

2. Course Registration.speaker: Student
2. Course Registration.english: Hello. How do I register for a course?

2. Course Registration.speaker: Staff
2. Course Registration.korean: 네 학교 포털 사이트에서 하시면 돼요. 학번으로 로그인하세요.
2. Course Registration.tts: 네 학교 포털 사이트에서 하시면 돼요. 학번으로 로그인하세요.
2. Course Registration.roman: ne hak-kkyo po-teol sa-i-teu-e-seo ha-si-myeon dwae-yo. hak-ppeo-neu-ro ro-geu-in-ha-se-yo.
2. Course Registration.english: Yes, you can do it on your school's portal site. Log in with your student number.

2. Course Registration.speaker: Student
2. Course Registration.english: When does the course registration period open?

2. Course Registration.speaker: Staff
2. Course Registration.korean: 다음 주 월요일 아침 아홉시부터 열려요. 인기 과목은 금방 마감되니까 일찍 접속하세요.
2. Course Registration.tts: 다음 주 월요일 아침 아홉시부터 열려요. 인기 과목은 금방 마감되니까 일찍 접속하세요.
2. Course Registration.roman: da-eum ju wo-ryo-il a-chim a-hop-ssi-bu-teo yeol-lyeo-yo. in-gi gwa-mo-geun geum-bang ma-gam-doe-ni-kka il-jjik jeop-sso-ka-se-yo.
2. Course Registration.english: It opens next Monday at 9:00 AM. Popular classes fill up quickly, so sign up early.

2. Course Registration.speaker: Student
2. Course Registration.english: Is there a limit to the number of students enrolled?

2. Course Registration.speaker: Staff
2. Course Registration.korean: 네 과목마다 정원이 달라요. 보통 30명에서 50명 사이예요.
2. Course Registration.tts: 네 과목마다 정원이 달라요. 보통 서른명에서 쉰명 사이예요.
2. Course Registration.roman: ne gwa-mong-ma-da jeong-wo-ni dal-la-yo. bo-tong seo-reun-myeong-e-seo swin-myeong sa-i-ye-yo.
2. Course Registration.english: Each subject has a different number of students. It's usually between 30 and 50.

2. Course Registration.speaker: Student
2. Course Registration.english: Can I also apply for a waiting list when the deadline closes?

2. Course Registration.speaker: Staff
2. Course Registration.korean: 네 대기 신청 가능해요. 자리가 나면 순서대로 등록돼요.
2. Course Registration.tts: 네 대기 신청 가능해요. 자리가 나면 순서대로 등록돼요.
2. Course Registration.roman: ne dae-gi sin-cheong ga-neung-hae-yo. ja-ri-ga na-myeon sun-seo-dae-ro deung-nok-ttwae-yo.
2. Course Registration.english: Yes, you can apply for a waiting list. You will be registered in the order in which seats become available.

2. Course Registration.speaker: Student
2. Course Registration.english: What is the credit limit per semester?

2. Course Registration.speaker: Staff
2. Course Registration.english: A regular semester allows up to 18 credits, and a summer semester allows up to 6 credits.

3. Academic Administration.speaker: Student
3. Academic Administration.english: Hello. I'm here to apply for a leave of absence.

3. Academic Administration.speaker: Staff
3. Academic Administration.korean: 네, 알겠습니다.. 휴학 사유가 어떻게 되세요?
3. Academic Administration.tts: 네, 알겠습니다.. 휴학 사유가 어떻게 되세요?
3. Academic Administration.roman: ne, al-get-sseum-ni-da.. hyu-hak sa-yu-ga eo-tteo-ke doe-se-yo?
3. Academic Administration.english: Yes, I understand.. What is the reason for your leave of absence?

3. Academic Administration.speaker: Student
3. Academic Administration.korean: 개인 사정 때문에 한 학기 쉬고 싶어요.
3. Academic Administration.tts: 개인 사정 때문에 한 학기 쉬고 싶어요.
3. Academic Administration.roman: gae-in sa-jeong ttae-mu-ne han hak-kki swi-go si-peo-yo.
3. Academic Administration.english: I want to take a semester off due to personal reasons.

3. Academic Administration.speaker: Staff
3. Academic Administration.korean: 그러시면 휴학 신청서 작성해 주세요. 신분증도 필요해요.
3. Academic Administration.tts: 그러시면 휴학 신청서 작성해 주세요. 신분증도 필요해요.
3. Academic Administration.roman: geu-reo-si-myeon hyu-hak sin-cheong-seo jak-sseong-hae ju-se-yo. sin-bun-jeung-do pi-ryo-hae-yo.
3. Academic Administration.english: If so, please fill out a leave of absence application. I'll also need your ID.

3. Academic Administration.speaker: Student
3. Academic Administration.korean: 휴학 기간은 최대 얼마나 할 수 있어요?
3. Academic Administration.tts: 휴학 기간은 최대 얼마나 할 수 있어요?
3. Academic Administration.roman: hyu-hak gi-ga-neun choe-dae eol-ma-na hal su i-sseo-yo?
3. Academic Administration.english: How long can I take a leave of absence?

3. Academic Administration.speaker: Staff
3. Academic Administration.korean: 한 번에 최대 1년까지 가능하고요 총 4학기까지 휴학할 수 있어요.
3. Academic Administration.tts: 한 번에 최대 1년까지 가능하고요 총 4학기까지 휴학할 수 있어요.
3. Academic Administration.roman: han beo-ne choe-dae 1nyeon-kka-ji ga-neung-ha-go-yo chong 4hak-kki-kka-ji hyu-ha-kal su i-sseo-yo.
3. Academic Administration.english: You can take a leave of absence for up to one year at a time, and up to a total of four semesters.

3. Academic Administration.speaker: Student
3. Academic Administration.english: Can I get a refund on my tuition?

3. Academic Administration.speaker: Staff
3. Academic Administration.korean: 개강 전이면 전액 환불되고요 개강 후에는 기간에 따라 차등 환불돼요.
3. Academic Administration.tts: 개강 전이면 전액 환불되고요 개강 후에는 기간에 따라 차등 환불돼요.
3. Academic Administration.roman: gae-gang jeo-ni-myeon jeo-naek hwan-bul-doe-go-yo gae-gang hu-e-neun gi-ga-ne tta-ra cha-deung hwan-bul-dwae-yo.
3. Academic Administration.english: If it is before the start of the semester, a full refund will be given. After the start of the semester, a differentiated refund will be given depending on the period.

3. Academic Administration.speaker: Student
3. Academic Administration.english: How do I return to school later?

3. Academic Administration.speaker: Staff
3. Academic Administration.korean: 복학 신청 기간에 포털에서 온라인으로 신청하시면 돼요. 별도 서류는 필요 없어요.
3. Academic Administration.tts: 복학 신청 기간에 포털에서 온라인으로 신청하시면 돼요. 별도 서류는 필요 없어요.
3. Academic Administration.roman: bo-kak sin-cheong gi-ga-ne po-teo-re-seo ol-la-i-neu-ro sin-cheong-ha-si-myeon dwae-yo. byeol-do seo-ryu-neun pi-ryo eop-seo-yo.
3. Academic Administration.english: You can apply online through the portal during the reinstatement application period. No additional documents are required.

4. Library Services.speaker: Student
4. Library Services.english: Hello. I'd like to borrow a book.

4. Library Services.speaker: Staff
4. Library Services.english: Could you show me your student ID?

4. Library Services.speaker: Student
4. Library Services.korean: 여기요. 한 번에 몇 권까지 빌릴 수 있어요?
4. Library Services.tts: 여기요. 한 번에 몇 권까지 빌릴 수 있어요?
4. Library Services.roman: yeo-gi-yo. han beo-ne myeot gwon-kka-ji bil-lil su i-sseo-yo?
4. Library Services.english: Here. How many books can I borrow at once?

4. Library Services.speaker: Staff
4. Library Services.tts: 학부생은 최대 열권까지 대학원생은 스무권까지 가능해요.
4. Library Services.roman: hak-ppu-saeng-eun choe-dae yeol-gwon-kka-ji dae-ha-gwon-saeng-eun seu-mu-gwon-kka-ji ga-neung-hae-yo.
4. Library Services.english: Undergraduate students can have up to 10 books, and graduate students can have up to 20 books.

4. Library Services.speaker: Student
4. Library Services.english: How long is the loan period?

4. Library Services.speaker: Staff
4. Library Services.korean: 2주 동안 빌리실 수 있어요. 예약자가 없으면 연장도 가능하고요.
4. Library Services.tts: 2주 동안 빌리실 수 있어요. 예약자가 없으면 연장도 가능하고요.
4. Library Services.roman: 2ju dong-an bil-li-sil su i-sseo-yo. ye-yak-jja-ga eop-seu-myeon yeon-jang-do ga-neung-ha-go-yo.
4. Library Services.english: You can rent it for two weeks. If there are no reservations, you can extend the stay.

4. Library Services.speaker: Student
4. Library Services.korean: 연장은 어떻게 해요? 직접 와야 해요?
4. Library Services.tts: 연장은 어떻게 해요? 직접 와야 해요?
4. Library Services.roman: yeon-jang-eun eo-tteo-ke hae-yo? jik-jjeop wa-ya hae-yo?
4. Library Services.english: How do I extend my stay? Do I have to come in person?

4. Library Services.speaker: Staff
4. Library Services.korean: 아니요 도서관 앱이나 홈페이지에서 온라인으로 연장하시면 돼요.
4. Library Services.tts: 아니요 도서관 앱이나 홈페이지에서 온라인으로 연장하시면 돼요.
4. Library Services.roman: a-ni-yo do-seo-gwan ae-bi-na hom-pe-i-ji-e-seo ol-la-i-neu-ro yeon-jang-ha-si-myeon dwae-yo.
4. Library Services.english: No, you can renew it online through the library app or website.

4. Library Services.speaker: Student
4. Library Services.english: Is there a late fee if I pay late?

4. Library Services.speaker: Staff
4. Library Services.korean: 네 하루에 100원씩 부과되고요 연체 중에는 추가 대출이 안 돼요.
4. Library Services.tts: 네 하루에 백원씩 부과되고요 연체 중에는 추가 대출이 안 돼요.
4. Library Services.roman: ne ha-ru-e bae-gwon-ssik bu-gwa-doe-go-yo yeon-che jung-e-neun chu-ga dae-chu-ri an dwae-yo.
4. Library Services.english: Yes, you will be charged 100 won per day and no additional loans will be available during the overdue period.

5. Scholarship Application.speaker: Student
5. Scholarship Application.english: Hello. I would like to apply for a scholarship.

5. Scholarship Application.speaker: Staff
5. Scholarship Application.korean: 네 어떤 종류의 장학금에 관심 있으세요?
5. Scholarship Application.tts: 네 어떤 종류의 장학금에 관심 있으세요?
5. Scholarship Application.roman: ne eo-tteon jong-nyu-ui jang-hak-kkeu-me gwan-sim i-sseu-se-yo?
5. Scholarship Application.english: Yes, what type of scholarship are you interested in?

5. Scholarship Application.speaker: Student
5. Scholarship Application.korean: 성적 장학금이요. 자격 조건이 어떻게 되나요?
5. Scholarship Application.tts: 성적 장학금이요. 자격 조건이 어떻게 되나요?
5. Scholarship Application.roman: seong-jeok jang-hak-kkeu-mi-yo. ja-gyeok jo-geo-ni eo-tteo-ke doe-na-yo?
5. Scholarship Application.english: It's an academic scholarship. What are the eligibility requirements?

5. Scholarship Application.speaker: Staff
5. Scholarship Application.korean: 평점 3.5 이상이면 신청 가능해요. 현재 평점이 어떻게 되세요?
5. Scholarship Application.tts: 평점 3.5 이상이면 신청 가능해요. 현재 평점이 어떻게 되세요?
5. Scholarship Application.roman: pyeong-jeom 3.5 i-sang-i-myeon sin-cheong ga-neung-hae-yo. hyeon-jae pyeong-jeo-mi eo-tteo-ke doe-se-yo?
5. Scholarship Application.english: You can apply if your rating is 3.5 or higher. What's your current rating?

5. Scholarship Application.speaker: Student
5. Scholarship Application.english: It's a 4.0. How much can I get?

5. Scholarship Application.speaker: Staff
5. Scholarship Application.korean: 4.0 이상이면 등록금 50% 장학금이 가능해요. 상위권이면 전액도 가능하고요.
5. Scholarship Application.tts: 4.0 이상이면 등록금 50% 장학금이 가능해요. 상위권이면 전액도 가능하고요.
5. Scholarship Application.roman: 4.0 i-sang-i-myeon deung-nok-kkeum 50% jang-hak-kkeu-mi ga-neung-hae-yo. sang-wi-gwo-ni-myeon jeo-naek-tto ga-neung-ha-go-yo.
5. Scholarship Application.english: If you have a GPA of 4.0 or higher, you can receive a 50% tuition scholarship. Top-tier students can even receive a full scholarship.

5. Scholarship Application.speaker: Student
5. Scholarship Application.english: Can I also apply for a national scholarship?

5. Scholarship Application.speaker: Staff
5. Scholarship Application.korean: 국가장학금은 별도로 신청하셔야 해요. 소득 기준에 따라 지원 금액이 달라져요.
5. Scholarship Application.tts: 국가장학금은 별도로 신청하셔야 해요. 소득 기준에 따라 지원 금액이 달라져요.
5. Scholarship Application.roman: guk-kka-jang-hak-kkeu-meun byeol-do-ro sin-cheong-ha-syeo-ya hae-yo. so-deuk gi-ju-ne tta-ra ji-won geu-mae-gi dal-la-jyeo-yo.
5. Scholarship Application.english: You must apply separately for the national scholarship. The amount of support varies depending on income.

5. Scholarship Application.speaker: Student
5. Scholarship Application.english: Where do I apply for the national scholarship?

5. Scholarship Application.speaker: Staff
5. Scholarship Application.korean: 한국장학재단 홈페이지에서 신청하시면 돼요. 매 학기 초에 신청 기간이 있어요.
5. Scholarship Application.tts: 한국장학재단 홈페이지에서 신청하시면 돼요. 매 학기 초에 신청 기간이 있어요.
5. Scholarship Application.roman: han-guk-jjang-hak-jjae-dan hom-pe-i-ji-e-seo sin-cheong-ha-si-myeon dwae-yo. mae hak-kki cho-e sin-cheong gi-ga-ni i-sseo-yo.
5. Scholarship Application.english: You can apply on the Korea Student Aid Foundation website. The application period is at the beginning of each semester.

6. Dormitory Application.speaker: Student
6. Dormitory Application.english: Hello. I would like to apply for a dormitory.

6. Dormitory Application.speaker: Staff
6. Dormitory Application.korean: 네 1인실이랑 2인실 중에 어떤 걸로 하실 건가요?
6. Dormitory Application.tts: 네 1인실이랑 2인실 중에 어떤 걸로 하실 건가요?
6. Dormitory Application.roman: ne 1in-si-ri-rang 2in-sil jung-e eo-tteon geol-lo ha-sil geon-ga-yo?
6. Dormitory Application.english: Yes, would you like a single room or a double room?

6. Dormitory Application.speaker: Student
6. Dormitory Application.english: How much is the price difference?

6. Dormitory Application.speaker: Staff
6. Dormitory Application.english: A single room costs 2 million won per semester, and a double room costs 1.5 million won.

6. Dormitory Application.speaker: Student
6. Dormitory Application.english: I'd like a double room. Is food included?

6. Dormitory Application.speaker: Staff
6. Dormitory Application.korean: 아니요 식비는 별도예요. 식권을 구매하시거나 기숙사 식당에서 현금 결제하시면 돼요.
6. Dormitory Application.tts: 아니요 식비는 별도예요. 식권을 구매하시거나 기숙사 식당에서 현금 결제하시면 돼요.
6. Dormitory Application.roman: a-ni-yo sik-ppi-neun byeol-do-ye-yo. sik-kkwo-neul gu-mae-ha-si-geo-na gi-suk-ssa sik-ttang-e-seo hyeon-geum gyeol-je-ha-si-myeon dwae-yo.
6. Dormitory Application.english: No, meals are separate. You can purchase meal tickets or pay in cash at the dormitory cafeteria.

6. Dormitory Application.speaker: Student
6. Dormitory Application.korean: 경쟁률이 어떻게 돼요? 신청하면 다 들어갈 수 있어요?
6. Dormitory Application.tts: 경쟁률이 어떻게 돼요? 신청하면 다 들어갈 수 있어요?
6. Dormitory Application.roman: gyeong-jaeng-nyu-ri eo-tteo-ke dwae-yo? sin-cheong-ha-myeon da deu-reo-gal su i-sseo-yo?
6. Dormitory Application.english: What's the competition rate? Can everyone who applies get in?

6. Dormitory Application.speaker: Staff
6. Dormitory Application.korean: 보통 3대 1 정도예요. 거리가 멀거나 저소득층 학생이 우선 선발돼요.
6. Dormitory Application.tts: 보통 세대 1 정도예요. 거리가 멀거나 저소득층 학생이 우선 선발돼요.
6. Dormitory Application.roman: bo-tong se-dae 1 jeong-do-ye-yo. geo-ri-ga meol-geo-na jeo-so-deuk-cheung hak-ssaeng-i u-seon seon-bal-dwae-yo.
6. Dormitory Application.english: It's usually about 3 to 1. Students from far away or low-income families are given priority.

6. Dormitory Application.speaker: Student
6. Dormitory Application.english: Is there something like a curfew?

6. Dormitory Application.speaker: Staff
6. Dormitory Application.korean: 자정 이후에는 외부인 출입이 금지되고요 입실은 새벽 두시까지 가능해요.
6. Dormitory Application.tts: 자정 이후에는 외부인 출입이 금지되고요 입실은 새벽 두시까지 가능해요.
6. Dormitory Application.roman: ja-jeong i-hu-e-neun oe-bu-in chu-ri-bi geum-ji-doe-go-yo ip-ssi-reun sae-byeok du-si-kka-ji ga-neung-hae-yo.
6. Dormitory Application.english: Entry by outsiders is prohibited after midnight, and check-in is possible until 2:00 AM.

7. Career Support Center.speaker: Student
7. Career Support Center.english: Hello. I would like to receive career counseling.

7. Career Support Center.speaker: Staff
7. Career Support Center.english: Yes, nice to meet you. Have you made an appointment for a consultation?

7. Career Support Center.speaker: Student
7. Career Support Center.korean: 아니요, 아직 안 했어요. 바로 상담 가능해요?
7. Career Support Center.tts: 아니요, 아직 안 했어요. 바로 상담 가능해요?
7. Career Support Center.roman: a-ni-yo, a-jik an hae-sseo-yo. ba-ro sang-dam ga-neung-hae-yo?
7. Career Support Center.english: No, not yet. Can I consult right away?

7. Career Support Center.speaker: Staff

1. Consultation Reservation Confirmation.speaker: Traveler
1. Consultation Reservation Confirmation.korean: 안녕하세요, 오늘 3시에 예약한 사라입니다. 미국에서 이메일로 미리 예약하고 왔어요.

1. Consultation Reservation Confirmation.tts: 네, 사라 님 맞으시네요. 확인 감사합니다. 우선 본인 확인을 위해 여권 제시 부탁드리고요, 이쪽 대기실에서 잠시만 기다려 주세요.
1. Consultation Reservation Confirmation.roman: ne, sa-ra nim ma-jeu-si-ne-yo. hwa-gin gam-sa-ham-ni-da. u-seon bo-nin hwa-gi-neul wi-hae yeo-gwon je-si bu-tak-tteu-ri-go-yo, i-jjok dae-gi-si-re-seo jam-si-man gi-da-ryeo ju-se-yo.

1. Consultation Reservation Confirmation.speaker: Traveler
1. Consultation Reservation Confirmation.korean: 네, 여기 여권 있습니다. 혹시 기다리는 동안 미리 작성해야 할 서류나 동의서 같은 게 있을까요?

2. Problem Area Consultation.roman: nu-ni neo-mu ja-ga bo-yeo-seo go-mi-ni-e-yo. hwa-ryeo-han neu-kkim-bo-da-neun han-guk yeo-nye-in-cheo-reom ja-yeon-seu-reop-kko si-won-han a-un-na-in ssang-kkeo-pu-reul won-ham-ni-da.

2. Problem Area Consultation.korean: 사라 님은 눈꺼풀 피부가 얇은 편이라 절개 없이 매몰법만으로도 충분히 원하시는 라인을 만드실 수 있습니다. 여기 거울 보시고 라인을 한번 잡아볼까요?

5. Pre-Surgery Precautions.english: I see. Thank you for letting me know in advance. You said to wear comfortable clothes on the day of the surgery. Is something like a hoodie okay?

5. Pre-Surgery Precautions.speaker: Staff
5. Pre-Surgery Precautions.korean: 수술 후 귀가하실 때 머리를 넘기기 힘드실 수 있으니, 후드티보다는 단추나 지퍼가 있는 앞트임 옷이 가장 편합니다. 그리고 귀금속은 모두 빼고 오셔야 해요.
5. Pre-Surgery Precautions.tts: 수술 후 귀가하실 때 머리를 넘기기 힘드실 수 있으니, 후드티보다는 단추나 지퍼가 있는 앞트임 옷이 가장 편합니다. 그리고 귀금속은 모두 빼고 오셔야 해요.

5. Pre-Surgery Precautions.english: You may have difficulty turning your head when you go home after surgery, so a button-down shirt with a zipper or button-down front is best, rather than a hoodie. Also, please remove all jewelry.

5. Pre-Surgery Precautions.korean: 알겠습니다. 렌즈도 빼고 안경을 쓰고 갈게요. 아, 혹시 보호자가 같이 와야 하나요? 저는 혼자 여행 중이라서요.

5. Pre-Surgery Precautions.english: Okay. I'll take off my contact lenses and wear glasses. Oh, and do I need a guardian to accompany me? I'm traveling alone.

5. Pre-Surgery Precautions.korean: 간단한 수술이라 혼자 오셔도 괜찮습니다. 수술이 끝나면 저희가 택시 타는 곳까지 안내해 드릴 테니 너무 걱정 마시고 편한 마음으로 오세요.

5. Pre-Surgery Precautions.english: This is a simple surgery, so you can come alone. After the surgery, we'll escort you to the taxi stand, so don't worry and come with peace of mind.

6. Post-Surgery Care.speaker: Traveler
6. Post-Surgery Care.korean: 수술한 부위가 조금 욱신거리고 많이 부은 것 같아요. 이대로 비행기를 타도 실밥이 터지거나 하지는 않겠죠?
6. Post-Surgery Care.tts: 수술한 부위가 조금 욱신거리고 많이 부은 것 같아요. 이대로 비행기를 타도 실밥이 터지거나 하지는 않겠죠?

6. Post-Surgery Care.english: The surgical site is a little sore and swollen. If I fly like this, the stitches won't burst or anything, right?

6. Post-Surgery Care.speaker: Staff
6. Post-Surgery Care.korean: 수술 직후에는 정상적인 반응이니 너무 걱정 마세요. 비행기 기압 때문에 실밥이 터지는 일은 없지만, 장시간 비행 시에는 얼굴이 더 부을 수 있습니다.
6. Post-Surgery Care.tts: 수술 직후에는 정상적인 반응이니 너무 걱정 마세요. 비행기 기압 때문에 실밥이 터지는 일은 없지만, 장시간 비행 시에는 얼굴이 더 부을 수 있습니다.

6. Post-Surgery Care.english: Don't worry too much, this is normal immediately after surgery. The stitches won't burst due to airplane pressure, but your face may swell more during long flights.

6. Post-Surgery Care.speaker: Traveler
6. Post-Surgery Care.korean: 그럼 기내에서 계속 냉찜질을 하는 게 좋을까요? 병원에서 주신 아이스팩을 비행기 안에서도 사용할 수 있나요?

6. Post-Surgery Care.english: So, is it okay to continue using the ice pack on the plane? Can I use the ice pack provided by the hospital on the plane?

6. Post-Surgery Care.speaker: Staff
6. Post-Surgery Care.korean: 아이스팩은 액체류로 분류될 수 있으니 승무원에게 얼음 주머니를 요청하시는 게 좋아요. 틈틈이 냉찜질을 해주시면 붓기 제거에 큰 도움이 됩니다.

6. Post-Surgery Care.english: Since ice packs can be classified as liquids, it's a good idea to ask the flight attendant for one. Applying cold compresses frequently can greatly help reduce swelling.

6. Post-Surgery Care.speaker: Traveler
6. Post-Surgery Care.korean: 네, 알겠습니다. 처방해 주신 약은 밥을 먹지 않아도 시간 맞춰서 복용해야 하나요? 제가 입맛이 없어서 식사를 거를까 봐요.
6. Post-Surgery Care.tts: 네, 알겠습니다. 처방해 주신 약은 밥을 먹지 않아도 시간 맞춰서 복용해야 하나요? 제가 입맛이 없어서 식사를 거를까 봐요.

6. Post-Surgery Care.english: Yes, I understand. Should I take the medication you prescribed at the correct time, even without eating? I'm worried I might skip meals because I have no appetite.

6. Post-Surgery Care.speaker: Staff

6. Post-Surgery Care.tts: 항생제가 포함되어 있어서 가급적 식사 후에 드시는 게 위장에 무리가 가지 않아요. 정 힘드시면 우유나 두유라도 드시고 꼭 약을 챙겨 드세요.

6. Post-Surgery Care.english: Since it contains antibiotics, it's best to take it after a meal to avoid stomach upset. If it's too difficult, drink milk or soy milk, and be sure to take your medication with you.

7. Side Effects and Follow-up Inquiry.tts: 사람마다 양쪽 회복 속도가 다를 수 있습니다. 지금 사진상으로는 단순한 멍으로 보이지만, 혹시 열감이 심하거나 진물이 나오기도 하나요?

7. Side Effects and Follow-up Inquiry.english: Recovery rates can vary from person to person. The photo shows a simple bruise, but is there any redness or pus?

7. Side Effects and Follow-up Inquiry.speaker: Traveler
7. Side Effects and Follow-up Inquiry.korean: 아니요, 진물은 안 나는데 살짝 가려운 느낌은 있어요. 미국에 돌아가서 갑자기 통증이 심해지면 현지 병원에 가야 하나요?

7. Side Effects and Follow-up Inquiry.english: No, there's no pus, but it feels a little itchy. If the pain suddenly gets worse when I return to the US, should I go to a local hospital?

7. Side Effects and Follow-up Inquiry.speaker: Staff

7. Side Effects and Follow-up Inquiry.english: Itching is a natural phenomenon that occurs as the wound heals. If the pain becomes unbearable, please contact us immediately. If necessary, we will refer you to an overseas affiliated hospital.

7. Side Effects and Follow-up Inquiry.speaker: Traveler
7. Side Effects and Follow-up Inquiry.korean: 아, 미국에도 협력 병원이 있군요! 정말 안심이 됩니다. 이메일로 연락드리면 원장님이 직접 봐주시는 건가요?
7. Side Effects and Follow-up Inquiry.tts: 아, 미국에도 협력 병원이 있군요! 정말 안심이 됩니다. 이메일로 연락드리면 원장님이 직접 봐주시는 건가요?

7. Side Effects and Follow-up Inquiry.english: Oh, so there's a partner hospital in the US too! That's so reassuring. If I contact you by email, will the director personally see me?

7. Side Effects and Follow-up Inquiry.speaker: Staff
7. Side Effects and Follow-up Inquiry.korean: 네, 전담 실장님을 통해 저에게 바로 전달됩니다. 경과 확인용 사진을 주기적으로 보내주시면 회복 상태를 계속 체크해 드릴게요.
7. Side Effects and Follow-up Inquiry.tts: 네, 전담 실장님을 통해 저에게 바로 전달됩니다. 경과 확인용 사진을 주기적으로 보내주시면 회복 상태를 계속 체크해 드릴게요.
7. Side Effects and Follow-up Inquiry.roman: ne, jeon-dam sil-jang-ni-meul tong-hae jeo-e-ge ba-ro jeon-dal-doem-ni-da. gyeong-gwa hwa-gi-nyong sa-ji-neul ju-gi-jeo-geu-ro bo-nae-ju-si-myeon hoe-bok sang-tae-reul gye-sok che-keu-hae deu-ril-ge-yo.
7. Side Effects and Follow-up Inquiry.english: Yes, it will be relayed directly to me through your dedicated manager. If you send me periodic progress photos, I'll continue to monitor your recovery.

8. Stitch Removal and Final Greeting.speaker: Traveler
8. Stitch Removal and Final Greeting.korean: 오늘 드디어 실밥을 제거하네요! 미국으로 돌아가기 전에 제거할 수 있어서 다행이에요. 제거할 때 많이 아픈가요?
8. Stitch Removal and Final Greeting.tts: 오늘 드디어 실밥을 제거하네요! 미국으로 돌아가기 전에 제거할 수 있어서 다행이에요. 제거할 때 많이 아픈가요?

8. Stitch Removal and Final Greeting.english: I finally got my stitches removed today! I'm glad I got them removed before I returned to the US. Does it hurt a lot when they're removed?

8. Stitch Removal and Final Greeting.speaker: Staff
8. Stitch Removal and Final Greeting.korean: 따끔따끔한 느낌이 들 수 있지만 금방 끝납니다. 자, 이제 다 끝났어요! 생각보다 라인이 아주 예쁘게 잡혔네요.
8. Stitch Removal and Final Greeting.tts: 따끔따끔한 느낌이 들 수 있지만 금방 끝납니다. 자, 이제 다 끝났어요! 생각보다 라인이 아주 예쁘게 잡혔네요.
8. Stitch Removal and Final Greeting.roman: tta-kkeum-tta-kkeum-han neu-kki-mi deul su it-jji-man geum-bang kkeun-nam-ni-da. ja, i-je da kkeun-na-sseo-yo! saeng-gak-ppo-da ra-i-ni a-ju ye-ppeu-ge ja-pyeon-ne-yo.
8. Stitch Removal and Final Greeting.english: It might feel a little tingly, but it'll be over quickly. Okay, we're done! The lines turned out much prettier than I expected.

8. Stitch Removal and Final Greeting.speaker: Traveler
8. Stitch Removal and Final Greeting.korean: 우와, 거울 보니까 정말 시원해졌네요! 아직 부어있긴 하지만 대만족입니다. 오늘부터는 세수도 평소처럼 해도 되나요?
8. Stitch Removal and Final Greeting.tts: 우와, 거울 보니까 정말 시원해졌네요! 아직 부어있긴 하지만 대만족입니다. 오늘부터는 세수도 평소처럼 해도 되나요?
8. Stitch Removal and Final Greeting.roman: u-wa, geo-ul bo-ni-kka jeong-mal si-won-hae-jyeon-ne-yo! a-jik bu-eo-it-kkin ha-ji-man dae-man-jo-gim-ni-da. o-neul-bu-teo-neun se-su-do pyeong-so-cheo-reom hae-do doe-na-yo?
8. Stitch Removal and Final Greeting.english: Wow, I look so refreshed in the mirror! I'm still puffy, but I'm very satisfied. Can I wash my face as usual starting today?

1. Temple Over the Sea Tour.english: Yes, it's one of the temples closest to the sea in Korea. They say if you pray here with sincerity, at least one wish will be granted.

1. Temple Over the Sea Tour.speaker: Traveler

1. Temple Over the Sea Tour.english: Then I should also pray for my family's health. I found my zodiac sign, the rabbit, among the twelve statues over there!

1. Signature Coffee Order.korean: 네, 예전 공장 건물들을 개조해서 만든 카페들이 많아요. 전포동만의 빈티지한 매력이 외국 분들께도 인기가 많습니다.
1. Signature Coffee Order.tts: 네, 예전 공장 건물들을 개조해서 만든 카페들이 많아요. 전포동만의 빈티지한 매력이 외국 분들께도 인기가 많습니다.

1. Signature Coffee Order.english: Yes, there are many cafes renovated from old factory buildings. Jeonpo-dong's unique vintage charm makes it popular among foreigners.

1. Signature Coffee Order.speaker: Traveler
1. Signature Coffee Order.korean: 메뉴판에 '전포 라떼'라고 있는데, 어떤 특징이 있나요? 달콤한 걸 좋아해요.

1. Signature Coffee Order.roman: me-nyu-pa-ne 'jeon-po ra-tte'ra-go in-neun-de, eo-tteon teuk-jjing-i in-na-yo? dal-kom-han geol jo-a-hae-yo.
1. Signature Coffee Order.english: There's something called "Jeonpo Latte" on the menu. What's special about it? I like sweet things.

1. Signature Coffee Order.speaker: Staff
1. Signature Coffee Order.korean: 저희 시그니처 메뉴인데, 진한 에스프레소 위에 고소한 옥수수 크림이 올라가서 아주 달콤하고 부드러워요.

1. Signature Coffee Order.roman: jeo-hui si-geu-ni-cheo me-nyu-in-de, jin-han e-seu-peu-re-so wi-e go-so-han ok-ssu-su keu-ri-mi ol-la-ga-seo a-ju dal-kom-ha-go bu-deu-reo-wo-yo.
1. Signature Coffee Order.english: This is our signature menu, and it's very sweet and smooth with rich corn cream on top of strong espresso.

1. Signature Coffee Order.speaker: Traveler
1. Signature Coffee Order.korean: 옥수수 크림이라니 특이하네요! 그럼 그거 한 잔이랑 직접 구우신 마들렌도 하나 주세요.
1. Signature Coffee Order.tts: 옥수수 크림이라니 특이하네요! 그럼 그거 한 잔이랑 직접 구우신 마들렌도 하나 주세요.
1. Signature Coffee Order.roman: ok-ssu-su keu-ri-mi-ra-ni teu-gi-ha-ne-yo! geu-reom geu-geo han ja-ni-rang jik-jjeop gu-u-sin ma-deul-len-do ha-na ju-se-yo.
1. Signature Coffee Order.english: Corn cream? That's unusual! Then, please give me a glass of that and one of your homemade madeleines.

1. Signature Coffee Order.speaker: Staff
1. Signature Coffee Order.korean: 좋습니다. 마들렌은 지금 막 구워져 나와서 따뜻해요. 2층 테라스 자리에 앉으시면 전포동 거리가 잘 보입니다.

1. Signature Coffee Order.english: Great. The madeleines are freshly baked and warm. If you sit on the second-floor terrace, you'll have a great view of Jeonpo-dong Street.

1. Glass Floor Walking.speaker: Traveler
1. Glass Floor Walking.korean: 와! 발밑이 유리라서 바다가 그대로 보여요! 너무 무서워서 발을 못 떼겠어요.
1. Glass Floor Walking.tts: 와! 발밑이 유리라서 바다가 그대로 보여요! 너무 무서워서 발을 못 떼겠어요.
1. Glass Floor Walking.roman: wa! bal-mi-chi yu-ri-ra-seo ba-da-ga geu-dae-ro bo-yeo-yo! neo-mu mu-seo-wo-seo ba-reul mot tte-ge-sseo-yo.
1. Glass Floor Walking.english: Wow! The floor is made of glass, so I can see the ocean! I'm so scared I can't take my feet off.

1. Glass Floor Walking.speaker: Staff
1. Glass Floor Walking.korean: 걱정 마세요! 아주 튼튼한 특수 강화유리입니다. 옆에 난간을 잡고 천천히 걸어보세요.
1. Glass Floor Walking.tts: 걱정 마세요! 아주 튼튼한 특수 강화유리입니다. 옆에 난간을 잡고 천천히 걸어보세요.
1. Glass Floor Walking.roman: geok-jjeong ma-se-yo! a-ju teun-teun-han teuk-ssu gang-hwa-yu-ri-im-ni-da. yeo-pe nan-ga-neul jap-kko cheon-cheon-hi geo-reo-bo-se-yo.
1. Glass Floor Walking.english: Don't worry! It's made of very strong, specially tempered glass. Just hold on to the railing and walk slowly.

1. Glass Floor Walking.speaker: Traveler
1. Glass Floor Walking.korean: 저기 보이는 섬들이 오륙도인가요? 왜 이름이 오륙도인가요?

1. Glass Floor Walking.roman: jeo-gi bo-i-neun seom-deu-ri o-ryuk-tto-in-ga-yo? wae i-reu-mi o-ryuk-tto-in-ga-yo?
1. Glass Floor Walking.english: Are the islands I see over there Oryukdo? Why is it called Oryukdo?

1. Glass Floor Walking.speaker: Staff
1. Glass Floor Walking.korean: 조류에 따라 섬이 다섯개로 보이기도 하고 여섯개로 보이기도 해서 오륙도라고 불러요. 정말 신기하죠?
1. Glass Floor Walking.tts: 조류에 따라 섬이 다섯개로 보이기도 하고 여섯개로 보이기도 해서 오륙도라고 불러요. 정말 신기하죠?
1. Glass Floor Walking.roman: jo-ryu-e tta-ra seo-mi da-seot-kkae-ro bo-i-gi-do ha-go yeo-seot-kkae-ro bo-i-gi-do hae-seo o-ryuk-tto-ra-go bul-leo-yo. jeong-mal sin-gi-ha-jyo?
1. Glass Floor Walking.english: Depending on the tide, the islands can appear as five or six, which is why they are called Oryukdo. Isn't it amazing?

1. Glass Floor Walking.speaker: Traveler
1. Glass Floor Walking.korean: 그렇군요! 날씨가 맑아서 저 멀리 대마도도 보일 것 같아요. 여기서 일본이 가깝긴 하네요.
1. Glass Floor Walking.tts: 그렇군요! 날씨가 맑아서 저 멀리 대마도도 보일 것 같아요. 여기서 일본이 가깝긴 하네요.
1. Glass Floor Walking.roman: geu-reo-ku-nyo! nal-ssi-ga mal-ga-seo jeo meol-li dae-ma-do-do bo-il geot ga-ta-yo. yeo-gi-seo jung-gu-gi ga-kkap-kkin ha-ne-yo.
1. Glass Floor Walking.english: I see! The weather is clear, so I think I can see Tsushima Island in the distance. Japan is pretty close from here.

1. Glass Floor Walking.speaker: Staff
1. Glass Floor Walking.korean: 운이 좋으면 수평선 끝으로 대마도가 희미하게 보이기도 해요. 자, 여기 배경으로 사진 한 장 찍어드릴게요!

1. Glass Floor Walking.roman: u-ni jo-eu-myeon su-pyeong-seon kkeu-teu-ro dae-ma-do-ga hui-mi-ha-ge bo-i-gi-do hae-yo. ja, yeo-gi bae-gyeong-eu-ro sa-jin han jang jji-geo-deu-ril-ge-yo!
1. Glass Floor Walking.english: If you're lucky, you might even see a faint glimpse of Tsushima Island on the horizon. Okay, let me take a photo with you here as the background!

1. Hanok Prop Shop Browsing.speaker: Traveler
1. Hanok Prop Shop Browsing.korean: 자개 무늬가 빛에 반사되니까 정말 영롱해요. 보석함으로 쓰기에 딱 좋을 것 같아요.

1. Hanok Prop Shop Browsing.english: The mother-of-pearl pattern reflects the light, making it truly beautiful. I think it would be perfect for a jewelry box.

1. Hanok Prop Shop Browsing.speaker: Staff
1. Hanok Prop Shop Browsing.korean: 선물용으로도 인기가 많아요. 깨지지 않게 보자기 포장도 정성스럽게 해드릴까요?

1. Hanok Prop Shop Browsing.english: It's also popular as a gift. Would you like us to carefully wrap it in a furoshiki to prevent it from breaking?

1. Hanok Prop Shop Browsing.speaker: Traveler
1. Hanok Prop Shop Browsing.korean: 네! 보자기 포장하는 법도 직접 배울 수 있는 원데이 클래스가 있나요?

1. Hanok Prop Shop Browsing.speaker: Staff
1. Hanok Prop Shop Browsing.korean: 매주 토요일에 운영하고 있어요. 영어 가이드 리플릿도 있으니 다음에 꼭 참여해 보세요.

1. Souffle Pancake Waiting.english: This is the most famous restaurant in Ikseon-dong, so there's a bit of a wait even on weekdays. You should be able to get in after waiting about 30 minutes.

1. Souffle Pancake Waiting.speaker: Traveler
1. Souffle Pancake Waiting.korean: 한옥 안에서 디저트를 먹는 게 너무 이색적이에요. 기다리는 동안 옆에 있는 운세 뽑기도 해볼까요?

1. Souffle Pancake Waiting.english: It's so unique to eat dessert inside a Hanok. While you wait, why not try the fortune teller nearby?

1. Souffle Pancake Waiting.speaker: Passerby

1. Souffle Pancake Waiting.english: Oh, that fortune teller over there? You put in a thousand won and smash it with a hammer. It's perfect for fun.

1. Souffle Pancake Waiting.speaker: Traveler
1. Souffle Pancake Waiting.korean: 미국의 포춘쿠키랑 비슷하면서도 망치를 쓰는 게 독특하네요. 재미있는 추억이 될 것 같아요.

1. Souffle Pancake Waiting.english: It's similar to an American fortune cookie, but it's unique in that it uses a hammer. I think it'll be a fun memory.

1. Hanyang Fortress Night Walk.tts: 성벽을 따라 걷다 보니 드라마 속 주인공이 된 기분이에요. 이 성벽은 조선 시대에 만든 건가요?

1. Hanyang Fortress Night Walk.english: Walking along the castle walls, I felt like I was the main character in a drama. Was this wall built during the Joseon Dynasty?

1. Hanyang Fortress Night Walk.speaker: Passerby

1. Hanyang Fortress Night Walk.english: Yes, this is the Hanyangdoseong Fortress Wall. It's a precious historical heritage that has been preserved to this day through numerous renovations since the reign of King Sejong.
